title: 028 - The Ultimate Weapon: David Morgan-Hewitt
description: On today's show, Gumpy calls in from Canada to discuss with the guys the legitimacy of the claims that Kim Jong-Un may be in bad shape medically, and end up talking about David Morgan-Hewitt, the British legend who some have said is 10 feet tall and weighs around 1,000 lbs, plus the guys react to the news in real time of Rob Gronkowski being traded to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers for a 4th round pick. Stay safe, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
